column3:
Anna's parents told her they were going to have a new baby brother.  She had never had a brother before.  She was not sure what to think about it.
ewline
ewline"What if he cries?" asked Anna.
ewline
ewline"If he cries we hold him until he is quiet," said Anna's dad.
ewline
ewline"What if he makes a mess in his diaper?" asked Anna.
ewline
ewline"Diapers smell but we clean them up," said Anna's mom.
ewline
ewlineAnna thought about having a baby brother.  Her mom and dad would take care of him. They bought a high chair for him to eat in.  They brought out her old crib for him to sleep in.  What could she do to help?  Anna wanted to help the baby play.  She thought it would be fun to play with him. 
ewline 
ewlineAnna saved up her money.  She had two whole dollars.  She went to the store to pick out a present for the baby.  She bought a rattle.  It cost all the money she had, but Anna was happy.  She could give a gift to the new baby.
column4: multiple: Why did Anna buy a rattle?
column5: She wanted a toy for herself
column6: She wanted a present for her mom
column7: She wanted to give the baby a toy to play with
column9: one: Where did the crib come from?
column11: Anna's dad used to sleep in it
column12: Anna used to sleep in it
column14: one: What did Anna's dad say he would do to a crying baby?
column19: multiple: How much did the rattle cost?
